markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Running Reload](/Feats.aspx?ID=504) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 172 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47) (Level 6), [Drow Shootist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=90) (Level 8), [Game Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=169) (Level 8), [Alkenstar Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=183) (Level 6)

</column>

---

You can reload your weapon on the move. You Stride, Step, or Sneak, then Interact to reload.
name: Running Reload
